name: token-attacher
title: Token Attacher
description: Attach anything(except other tokens) to tokens, so that they move when the token moves and rotate/move when the token rotates. To be able to attach measure templates, lights, sounds and journals you need the select-tool-everywhere module, as of writing this there is no select tool in those controls.
author: KayelGee - KayelGee#5241
